page.title: 17CHARACTERS, WEST KILBRIDE(2)
page.content: { THE NEWSAGENT Mr Blyth has owned a shop in Main Street for 28 years but it has been an established newsagent's for 50{years. {He delivers a great amount of newspapers each day. The most popular paper is the{Glasgow Herald _}he delivers 300 of them each day. The most popular{local paper}is the{Largs {and Millport Weekly News}which is actually printed in Ardrossan. {THE POLICEMAN There is a small{local police station in West Kilbride. Four men work there. They all have different shifts. The early shift is from 7a.m. until 2p.m., the back shift is from 2p.m. until 11p.m. and the late shift is from 11p.m. until 7a.m. In West Kilbride there are very few major crimes. The most common are ones like shop-lifting, etc.
